descriptionHtml:
[Description]

- Ever felt like those bounty or another quests gave you crappy rewards ? Here\'s your mod, it will improve most of the quests gold wise.
I\'ll update more quests if people want, I would love some feedback...

PS: Request me better rewards for certain quests ! I\'ll update this mod as long as I do certain quests or people suggest me some changes in quests.

[Installation]

Option A- Manually extract the file to your Skyrim/Data folder.
Option B- Manually download the file, open your Skyrim Mod Manager and on your left side there\'s a blue button, click on that and add the file you downloaded.

[Uninstallation]

Option A- Manually remove Quest Rewards.esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.
Option B- Open your Skyrim Mod Manager, on left side press second blue button and it will auto remove the file.

[Changelog]

- Version 1.00
** Official Release

- Version 1.10

- Version 1.10
** Bounty Quests Rewards Revamped. (It was 100g for every bounty quest, but not anymore.)
** Larceny Targets - Gold Revamp & New Item (Requested) (Elven Arrows, ammount will depend on your level)
** Hail Sithis - Changed Reward 20000 to 28000 (Requested) (Since you have to spend about 18k to revamp Guild, now you will have 10k as bonus)
author: TweakDev
